name: Fruitjam Survivors
description:
Fruit-Themed grappling hook action!

Defeat enemies and use their juice at Fruit-Powered Violence Juicers™ to power up your weapons or create new ones!

Controls:
Left click to grapple
A/D to move left right
W to reel in grappling hook
S to reel out grappling hook
E to interact
Space to jump (and double jump!)
